name: Gamble Modifier
description:
This is my entry for the GMTK Game Jam 2022.

Roll for different  modifiers and choose between points but a higher difficultly, or less points but better chance at survival.

Controls

  • A/D to move left and right
  • Space to jump (You can double jump)
  • Left click to shoot

Tools Used:

  • Unity 2020.3.11f1
  • VS Code
  • Krita
  • Paint 3D
  • BFXR
  • Lospec

Music is Darker Waves by Zander Noriega - https://opengameart.org/content/darker-waves

Note: I won't be able to answer comments or play other games during the voting period as I am going away for a week.
